name: YOUNG EARTH DRAKE
desc: A wingless dragon-like creature whose scales resemble dirt clods and occasionally crackle with static electricity

features.name: Tough Hide
features.desc: When the Drake takes physical damage, reduce it by 3.

features.name: Stomp
features.desc: to make the Drake rear up on their hind legs and slam down, creating a shockwave. All targets within Close range must make a Strength or Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 1d10 magic damage, mark a Stress, and are Vulnerable until they clear a Stress. Targets who succeed take half damage.

features.name: Chomp
features.desc: Make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, Spend a Fear to deal an additional 1d12 physical damage from a powerful bite. The target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits (they can still use armor to reduce the damage). If they can’t mark an Armor Slot, they must mark an additional HP and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Dug In
features.desc: If an attack would move the Drake, mark 2 Stress to move two fewer ranges. (for example, Far becomes Very Close).

name: SAND SPRITE
desc: A small, fairy-like creature made of sand and dirt

features.name: Flying
features.desc: While flying, the Sand Sprite gains a +2 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Spray Sand
features.desc: to cover nearby foes with fine, glittering sand. All targets within Close range have disadvantage on their next action roll and must make an Agility or Instinct Reaction Roll. All targets that fail mark a Stress and are Vulnerable until they next act.

features.name: Go For the Eyes
features.desc: Make a standard attack against a target in Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to Blind the target. While Blinded, the target makes attack rolls at disadvantage. A target can clear the condition with a successful Finesse Roll.

features.name: Evade
features.desc: When an attack misses the Sprite, they can move to a point within Close range.

name: MINOR EARTH ELEMENTAL
desc: A collection of rocks and stones that move as a cohesive unit

features.name: Like a Rock
features.desc: When the Elemental is Hidden they remain unseen if they are stationary. Instinct and Knowledge Rolls to determine their location are made at disadvantage. Additionally, when they first enter the scene, they are Hidden.

features.name: Rolling Thunder
features.desc: to move in a straight line to a point within Far range. All targets within their path must succeed on an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 1d12+4 physical damage and mark a Stress. Targets who succeed take half damage.

features.name: Surprise Slam
features.desc: When a target moves within Very Close range of the Elemental while they are Hidden, move the Elemental into Melee range of the target and make a standard attack with advantage.

name: SPARKFLIES
desc: A swarm of sparkling insects who consume electricity

features.name: Horde (1d6+1)
features.desc: When the Sparkflies have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d6+1 magic damage instead.

features.name: Flying
features.desc: While flying, the Sparkflies gain a +2 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Crackle
features.desc: to expel electricity at nearby foes. All targets within Close range must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 1d8+6 magic damage and mark a Stress. Targets who succeed take half damage

name: SILKWING BROODMOTHER
desc: A large cave-dwelling bat-spider hybrid with rows of gnashing teeth dripping with venom

features.name: Terrifying
features.desc: When the Broodmother makes a successful attack, all PCs within Far range lose a Hope and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Gliding Leap
features.desc: The Broodmother can mark a Stress to move up to Far range instead of Close range before taking an action.

features.name: Deafening Screech
features.desc: to release a shockwave of sound in front of the Broodmother within Close range. All targets in this area must make an Instinct Reaction Roll. Targets who fail have disadvantage on their next action roll and mark 2 Stress.

features.name: Feasting Call
features.desc: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon a Silkwing Cluster, which appears at Far range and immediately takes the spotlight.

features.name: Ichorfang Bite
features.desc: Make a standard attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, mark a Stress. The target takes 2d10+6 physical damage and must make a Strength Reaction Roll. On a failure, the target is Slowed. A Slowed target must mark a Stress every time they make an action roll until they clear the condition with a successful Instinct Roll.

name: SILKWING CLUSTER
desc: A group of halfling-sized cave-dwelling bat-spiders with gnashing teeth
motives: Find Food, grow big, protect the broodmother

features.name: Horde (1d10+1)
features.desc: When the Silkwing Cluster has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d10+1 physical damage instead.

features.name: Echolocation
features.desc: Creatures within Close range of the Silkwing Cluster cannot benefit from the Hidden or Cloaked conditions.

features.name: Feeding Frenzy
features.desc: and make a standard attack against all targets in Very Close range. All targets the Silkwing Cluster succeeds against mark a Stress.

name: SILKWING CONSORT
desc: A human-sized skittering spider creature with short legs and a deadly bite.
motives: Ambush prey, hide from the Broodmother, make attacks of opportunity

features.name: Chitinous Plating
features.desc: When the Consort takes physical damage, reduce it by 3.

features.name: Skittering Glide
features.desc: The Consort can climb and walk on vertical surfaces and even upside down, additionally they can mark a Stress to move up to Far range instead of Close range before taking an action.

features.name: Opportunity Attack
features.desc: When an ally deals damage to a target within Close range of the Consort, mark a Stress to move into Melee range of the target and add 2d12 to the damage roll.

name: SILKWING WEBSPITTER
desc: A fragile human-sized flying spider-bat hybrid with a spikecovered carapace.

features.name: Flight
features.desc: While flying, the Webspitter gains a +3 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Weaver’s Aim
features.desc: The Webspitter has advantage against targets who are Restrained.

features.name: Spit Webs
features.desc: and choose a point within Far range. All targets within a Very Close range of that point must make an Agility Reaction Roll (14). Targets who fail are Restrained by a web until they break free with a successful Strength Roll. Targets who succeed are moved out of the area.

features.name: Paralytic Venom
features.desc: to make an attack against a target within Far range. On a success, the target takes 2d6+2 direct physical damage and is Vulnerable until the end of the Scene.

name: FIRE BEETLES
desc: A swarm of fist-sized red beetles which feed on burning coals and hibernate in the ground or trees until awakened by an active blaze.

features.name: Horde (3d4+2)
features.desc: When the Fire Beetles have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 3d4+2 physical damage instead.

features.name: Blazing Swarm
features.desc: When the Beetles succeed on an attack, give the target a swarm token. If the target has any swarm tokens, they are Burning. While Burning a target must spend a Hope to make an action roll. If a target has 3 or more swarm tokens, they are also Vulnerable. All swarm tokens can be removed by succeeding on a Finesse or Instinct Roll (15 + the number of swarm tokens) or dealing severe damage to the Beetles.

name: FLAME FANNER
desc: A small, imp-like creature often seen in proximity to Ignocerouses.
motives: Feed the fire, bob and weave, sow chaos, protect the Ignocerous

features.name: Flight
features.desc: While flying, the Flame Fanner has a +2 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Fan the Flames
features.desc: to furiously beat the Fanner’s wings and fan the flames of an Ignocerous in Very Close range. The Ignocerous heals 1 HP.

features.name: Quick Reflexes
features.desc: When the Flame Fanner takes damage from an attack within Close range, you can mark a Stress to take half damage.

name: IGNOCEROUS
desc: A large, aggressive beast, bathed in fire and brimstone
motives: Defend territory, charge, watch it burn

features.name: Relentless (3)
features.desc: The Ignocerous can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Wreathed in Flame
features.desc: When the Ignocerous takes magic damage, reduce it by 2d8.

features.name: Blazing Trail
features.desc: After the Ignocerous uses its Fiery Charge, it leaves a trail of fire along the path it took. PCs must mark a Stress and make an Agility or Strength action roll to move through a trail while it burns. When it uses Fiery Charge again, the previous trail subsides.

features.name: Fiery Charge
features.desc: Spend 2 Fear to have the Ignocerous snort a gout of flame and dash in a line toward a target within Far range, leaving a Blazing Trail in their wake. On a success, the target takes 3d20+8 physical damage and is knocked back to Close range. Targets within Melee range of the line must make an Agility Reaction roll or take 3d6+8 physical damage and mark a Stress.

features.name: Infernal Heat
features.desc: When the Ignocerous takes damage from an attack within Close range, deal 3d6 magic damage to the attacker and they must mark a Stress.

name: ASHEN DEMON KING
desc: A hulking being of molten lava and volcanic rock who rules the Circle of the Burned
motives: Immolate opposition, spread influence, rest control from others

features.name: Relentless (3)
features.desc: The Demon King can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Requiem For The Fallen
features.desc: If an ally marks its last HP within Close range of the Demon King, you gain a Fear.

features.name: No Rest For The Wicked
features.desc: Spend 2 Fear to return up to 1d4+1 defeated Flamereaver allies to the battle at the points where they first appeared (with no marked HP or Stress).

features.name: Declaration of Hate
features.desc: to make a target Hated in the eyes of the Demon King. While Hated, all Demons have advantage on action rolls against the target. If the target makes a Death Move while being Hated, they use a d10 for their Hope Die to Avoid Death or Risk it All. The Demon King can only mark one target at a time.

features.name: Incineration Beam
features.desc: to issue a burning beam from the Demon King’s chest at any number of targets in a line up to Far range. All targets must succeed on an Agility Reaction Roll or take 4d6 magic damage. If the target marks HP, they become Inflamed. Inflamed targets mark 1 HP and 1 Stress when they make an action roll and then clear the condition.

features.name: Call the Fires Below
features.desc: Countdown (6) When the Demon King is in the spotlight for the first time, activate the countdown. When it triggers, choose 3 points within Far range. A Very Close area around these points erupts into flames. All targets within these areas must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 4d6+6 magic damage. Additionally, summon a Flamereaver in each area.

name: FLAMEREAVER
desc: A demon with burning red skin and horns made of fire that burst from its forehead
motives: Fight for power, burn the land, focus single targets

features.name: Fires Of The First Circle
features.desc: When the Flamereaver takes magic damage, reduce it by 1 0. When the Flamereaver marks 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker must mark a Stress.

features.name: Hellish Provocation
features.desc: Make a Standard attack against a target. On a success, mark a Stress to Taunt target until their next successful attack. The next time the Taunted target attacks, they have disadvantage against targets other than the Flamereaver.

features.name: Fiery Rebuke
features.desc: When an attack misses the Flamereaver, the attacker takes 2d10 direct magic damage.

name: CINDERWRETCH
desc: A monster on all fours that belches flames and incinerates foes

features.name: Anti Air Assault
features.desc: Before the Cinderwretch makes an attack against a flying target, roll a d 6. On a result of 4 or higher, the target’s Evasion is halved against this attack.

features.name: Hellblister
features.desc: and choose a point within Far range. Make an attack against all targets within Close range of that point. Targets the Cinderwretch succeeds against take 2d10 magic damage. Targets that it misses mark a Stress.

name: PYROTHURGE
desc: A demon with flaming wings that stokes the fires of its hellish brethren.
motives: Extract will, spur on anger, allow others to do the fighting

features.name: Horrid Binding
features.desc: When the Pyrothurge is within Close range of an ally, they can cause the ally to mark a Stress and immediately take the spotlight. The Pyrothurge then clears a Stress. Attacks they make while spotlighted in this way deal half damage.

features.name: Wall of Fire
features.desc: and choose two points in Far range. Fire ignites in a line between these two points. All targets within Very Close range of the line or who try to move through it must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 6d6 fire damage. Targets who succeed take half. The Pyrothurge can only make one wall at a time. If the Pyrothurge takes Severe damage, the effect ends.

features.name: Abyssal Hex
features.desc: to force a target within Far range to make a Knowledge Reaction Roll. On a failure, the target is Hexed until the end of the scene or the Pyrothurge marks its last HP. When a Hexed target spends Hope or marks stress, they must double the amount spent or marked.
